refnamediv.refpurpose: truly random opcodes with controllable range.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Truly random opcodes with controllable range. These units are for Unix-like systems only and use /dev/urandom to construct Csound random values

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: imin -- minimum value of range; defaults to -1.
imax -- maximum value of range; defaults to +1.

note.title: Notes
note.para: The algorithm produces 2^64 different possible values which are scaled to fit the range requested. The randomness comes form the usual Linux/OSX /dev/urandom method, and there is no guarantee that it will be truly random, but there is a good chance. It does not show any cycles.
